attributes.action: investigate the practicality of building a power station driven by treadmill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The treadmills would in turn be driven by delinquents, convicted criminals, vandals, and antisocial elements serving a sentence involving community service. 
This would serve the purpose of converting negative energy to a positive contribution, and reducing dependancy on foreign oil, fossil fuels and nuclear sources.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
